ModMetaData.name: ExoHead
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds pack of brain implants:) much more then u think) I hope.. ADDS 13 BRAIN IMPLANTS + 2 NEW ITEMS : IMPLANTS: 1)Binary processor 2)Neuro-Connection Overclocker (NCO) 3)Neuro redistributor 4)Neuro activator 5)Neuro interface 6)Neuro assistance 7)Exo AI 8)Mood amplifier 9)Holo-partner 10)Advanced memory descriptor (AMD) 11)Neuro trainer 12)Combat assistant 13)Psy defender
ITEMS: 1)Neuro Kit 2)Neuro Wire's
ModMetaData.author: McMinox
